segments.text: This is my first trip to Hong Kong , and I'd like to see some of the city's sights .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Only three days on business so I won't have a long time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are many tourist attractions in Hong Kong .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have some information on these ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me give you some brochures to look over .
segments.speaker: S2
